card.name: Adventuring Gear
card.text: Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, equipped creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Equip {1}

card.name: AEther Figment
Akoum Refuge
card.text: Akoum Refuge enters the battlefield tapped. When Akoum Refuge enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life. {T}: Add {B} or {R} to your mana pool.

card.name: Archive Trap
card.text: If an opponent searched his or her library this turn, you may pay {0} rather than pay Archive Trap's mana cost. Target opponent puts the top thirteen cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

card.name: Archmage Ascension
card.text: At the beginning of each end step, if you drew two or more cards this turn, you may put a quest counter on Archmage Ascension. As long as Archmage Ascension has six or more quest counters on it, if you would draw a card, you may instead search your library for a card, put that card into your hand, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Arid Mesa
card.text: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Arid Mesa: Search your library for a Mountain or Plains card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Armament Master
card.text: Other Kor creatures you control get +2/+2 for each Equipment attached to Armament Master.

card.name: Arrow Volley Trap
card.text: If four or more creatures are attacking, you may pay {1}{W} rather than pay Arrow Volley Trap's mana cost. Arrow Volley Trap deals 5 damage divided as you choose among any number of target attacking creatures.

card.name: Bala Ged Thief
card.text: Whenever Bala Ged Thief or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, target player reveals a number of cards from his or her hand equal to the number of Allies you control. You choose one of them. That player discards that card.

card.name: Baloth Cage Trap
card.text: If an opponent had an artifact enter the battlefield under his or her control this turn, you may pay {1}{G} rather than pay Baloth Cage Trap's mana cost. Put a 4/4 green Beast creature token onto the battlefield.

card.name: Baloth Woodcrasher
card.text: Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Baloth Woodcrasher gets +4/+4 and gains trample until end of turn.

card.name: Beast Hunt
card.text: Reveal the top three cards of your library. Put all creature cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.

card.name: Beastmaster Ascension
card.text: Whenever a creature you control attacks, you may put a quest counter on Beastmaster Ascension. As long as Beastmaster Ascension has seven or more quest counters on it, creatures you control get +5/+5.

card.name: Blade of the Bloodchief
card.text: Whenever a creature dies, put a +1/+1 counter on equipped creature. If equipped creature is a Vampire, put two +1/+1 counters on it instead. Equip {1}

card.name: Blazing Torch
Blood Seeker
card.text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under an opponent's control, you may have that player lose 1 life.

card.name: Blood Tribute
card.text: Kicker - Tap an untapped Vampire you control. Target opponent loses half his or her life, rounded up. If Blood Tribute was kicked, you gain life equal to the life lost this way.

card.name: Bloodchief Ascension
card.text: At the beginning of each end step, if an opponent lost 2 or more life this turn, you may put a quest counter on Bloodchief Ascension. Whenever a card is put into an opponent's graveyard from anywhere, if Bloodchief Ascension has three or more quest counters on it, you may have that player lose 2 life. If you do, you gain 2 life.

card.name: Bloodghast
card.text: Bloodghast can't block. Bloodghast has haste as long as an opponent has 10 or less life. Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may return Bloodghast from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Bold Defense
card.text: Kicker {3}{W} Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. If Bold Defense was kicked, instead creatures you control get +2/+2 and gain first strike until end of turn.

card.name: Brave the Elements
card.text: Choose a color. White creatures you control gain protection from the chosen color until end of turn.

card.name: Burst Lightning
card.text: Kicker {4} Burst Lightning deals 2 damage to target creature or player. If Burst Lightning was kicked, it deals 4 damage to that creature or player instead.

card.name: Caller of Gales
card.text: {1}{U}, {T}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.

card.name: Cancel
card.text: Counter target spell.

card.name: Carnage Altar
card.text: {3}, Sacrifice a creature: Draw a card.

card.name: Celestial Mantle
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +3/+3. Whenever enchanted creature deals combat damage to a player, double its controller's life total.

card.name: Chandra Ablaze
card.text: +1: Discard a card. If a red card is discarded this way, Chandra Ablaze deals 4 damage to target creature or player. -2: Each player discards his or her hand, then draws three cards. -7: Cast any number of red instant and/or sorcery cards from your graveyard without paying their mana costs.

card.name: Cobra Trap
card.text: If a noncreature permanent under your control was destroyed this turn by a spell or ability an opponent controlled, you may pay {G} rather than pay Cobra Trap's mana cost. Put four 1/1 green Snake creature tokens onto the battlefield.

card.name: Conqueror's Pledge
card.text: Kicker {6} Put six 1/1 white Kor Soldier creature tokens onto the battlefield. If Conqueror's Pledge was kicked, put twelve of those tokens onto the battlefield instead.

card.name: Cosi's Trickster
card.text: Whenever an opponent shuffles his or her library, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Cosi's Trickster.

card.name: Crypt of Agadeem
card.text: Crypt of Agadeem enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {B} to your mana pool. {2}, {T}: Add {B} to your mana pool for each black creature card in your graveyard.

card.name: Crypt Ripper
card.text: Haste {B}: Crypt Ripper gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Day of Judgment
card.text: Destroy all creatures.

card.name: Demolish
card.text: Destroy target artifact or land.

card.text: Destroy target land. Its controller discards a card.

card.name: Disfigure
card.text: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.

card.text: Creatures you control get +1/+1 and have flying and indestructible. At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice a creature. If you can't, sacrifice Eldrazi Monument.

card.name: Electropotence
card.text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay {2}{R}. If you do, that creature deals damage equal to its power to target creature or player.

card.name: Elemental Appeal
card.text: Kicker {5} Put a 7/1 red Elemental creature token with trample and haste onto the battlefield. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step. If Elemental Appeal was kicked, that creature gets +7/+0 until end of turn.

card.text: Flying Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a 1/1 white Bird creature token with flying onto the battlefield.

card.name: Emeria, the Sky Ruin
card.text: Emeria, the Sky Ruin enters the battlefield tapped. At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control seven or more Plains, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. {T}: Add {W} to your mana pool.

card.name: Eternity Vessel
card.text: Eternity Vessel enters the battlefield with X charge counters on it, where X is your life total. Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may have your life total become the number of charge counters on Eternity Vessel.

card.text: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Expedition Map: Search your library for a land card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

card.text: If three or more creatures are attacking, you may pay {U} rather than pay Lethargy Trap's mana cost. Attacking creatures get -3/-0 until end of turn.

Activate this ability only if Luminarch Ascension has four or more quest counters on it.

card.name: Seascape Aerialist
card.text: Whenever Seascape Aerialist or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, you may have Ally creatures you control gain flying until end of turn.

card.name: Seismic Shudder
card.text: Seismic Shudder deals 1 damage to each creature without flying.

card.name: Sejiri Refuge
card.text: Sejiri Refuge enters the battlefield tapped. When Sejiri Refuge enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life. {T}: Add {W} or {U} to your mana pool.

card.name: Shepherd of the Lost
card.text: Flying, first strike, vigilance

card.name: Shieldmate's Blessing
card.text: Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.

card.name: Shoal Serpent
card.text: Defender Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Shoal Serpent loses defender until end of turn.

card.name: Slaughter Cry
card.text: Target creature gets +3/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.

card.name: Soaring Seacliff
card.text: Soaring Seacliff enters the battlefield tapped. When Soaring Seacliff enters the battlefield, target creature gains flying until end of turn. {T}: Add {U} to your mana pool.

card.name: Sorin Markov
card.text: +2: Sorin Markov deals 2 damage to target creature or player and you gain 2 life. -3: Target opponent's life total becomes 10. -7: You control target player during that player's next turn.

card.name: Soul Stair Expedition
card.text: Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a quest counter on Soul Stair Expedition. Remove three quest counters from Soul Stair Expedition and sacrifice it: Return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Spell Pierce
card.text: Counter target noncreature spell unless its controller pays {2}.

card.name: Sphinx of Jwar Isle
card.text: Flying, shroud You may look at the top card of your library.

card.name: Sphinx of Lost Truths
Spidersilk Net
card.text: Equipped creature gets +0/+2 and has reach. Equip {2}

card.name: Spire Barrage
card.text: Spire Barrage deals damage to target creature or player equal to the number of Mountains you control.

card.name: Spreading Seas
card.text: Enchant land When Spreading Seas enters the battlefield, draw a card. Enchanted land is an Island.

card.name: Steppe Lynx
card.text: Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Steppe Lynx gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Summoner's Bane
card.text: Counter target creature spell. Put a 2/2 blue Illusion creature token onto the battlefield.

card.name: Summoning Trap
card.text: If a creature spell you cast this turn was countered by a spell or ability an opponent controlled, you may pay {0} rather than pay Summoning Trap's mana cost. Look at the top seven cards of your library. You may put a creature card from among them onto the battlefield. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Sunspring Expedition
card.text: Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a quest counter on Sunspring Expedition. Remove three quest counters from Sunspring Expedition and sacrifice it: You gain 8 life.

card.name: Surrakar Marauder
card.text: Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Surrakar Marauder gains intimidate until end of turn.

card.name: Tajuru Archer
card.text: Whenever Tajuru Archer or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, you may have Tajuru Archer deal damage to target creature with flying equal to the number of Allies you control.

card.name: Tanglesap
card.text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn by creatures without trample.

card.name: Teetering Peaks
card.text: Teetering Peaks enters the battlefield tapped. When Teetering Peaks enters the battlefield, target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn. {T}: Add {R} to your mana pool.

card.name: Tempest Owl
Terra Stomper
card.text: Terra Stomper can't be countered. Trample

card.name: Territorial Baloth
card.text: Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Territorial Baloth gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Timbermaw Larva
card.text: Whenever Timbermaw Larva attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each Forest you control.

card.name: Torch Slinger
card.text: Kicker {1}{R} When Torch Slinger enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, it deals 2 damage to target creature.

card.name: Trailblazer's Boots
card.text: Equipped creature has nonbasic landwalk. Equip {2}

card.name: Trapfinder's Trick
card.text: Target player reveals his or her hand and discards all Trap cards.

card.name: Trapmaker's Snare
card.text: Search your library for a Trap card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Trusty Machete
card.text: Equipped creature gets +2/+1. Equip {2}

card.name: Tuktuk Grunts
card.text: Haste Whenever Tuktuk Grunts or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Tuktuk Grunts.

card.name: Turntimber Basilisk
card.text: Deathtouch Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may have target creature block Turntimber Basilisk this turn if able.

card.name: Turntimber Grove
card.text: Turntimber Grove enters the battlefield tapped. When Turntimber Grove enters the battlefield, target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.

card.name: Turntimber Ranger
card.text: Whenever Turntimber Ranger or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a 2/2 green Wolf creature token onto the battlefield. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on Turntimber Ranger.

card.name: Umara Raptor
card.text: Flying Whenever Umara Raptor or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Umara Raptor.

card.name: Unstable Footing
card.text: Kicker {3}{R} Damage can't be prevented this turn. If Unstable Footing was kicked, it deals 5 damage to target player.

card.name: Valakut, the Molten Pinnacle
card.text: Valakut, the Molten Pinnacle enters the battlefield tapped. Whenever a Mountain enters the battlefield under your control, if you control at least five other Mountains, you may have Valakut, the Molten Pinnacle deal 3 damage to target creature or player. {T}: Add {R} to your mana pool.

card.name: Vampire Hexmage
card.text: First strike Sacrifice Vampire Hexmage: Remove all counters from target permanent.

card.name: Vampire Lacerator
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life unless an opponent has 10 or less life.

card.name: Vampire's Bite
card.text: Kicker {2}{B} Target creature gets +3/+0 until end of turn. If Vampire's Bite was kicked, that creature gains lifelink until end of turn.

card.name: Verdant Catacombs
card.text: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Verdant Catacombs: Search your library for a Swamp or Forest card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Vines of Vastwood
card.text: Kicker {G} Target creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control this turn. If Vines of Vastwood was kicked, that creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn.

card.name: Warren Instigator
card.text: Double strike Whenever Warren Instigator deals damage to an opponent, you may put a Goblin creature card from your hand onto the battlefield.

card.name: Welkin Tern
card.text: Flying Welkin Tern can block only creatures with flying.

card.name: Whiplash Trap
card.text: If an opponent had two or more creatures enter the battlefield under his or her control this turn, you may pay {U} rather than pay Whiplash Trap's mana cost. Return two target creatures to their owners' hands.

card.name: Windborne Charge
card.text: Two target creatures you control each get +2/+2 and gain flying until end of turn.

card.name: Windrider Eel
card.text: Flying Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Windrider Eel gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: World Queller
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may choose a card type. If you do, each player sacrifices a permanent of that type.

card.name: Zektar Shrine Expedition
card.text: Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a quest counter on Zektar Shrine Expedition. Remove three quest counters from Zektar Shrine Expedition and sacrifice it: Put a 7/1 red Elemental creature token with trample and haste onto the battlefield. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.
